Sleek Sophistication and Superb Views
In Room Auction Day Tues 15 Oct 2019 - Manningham City Council | Function Room 1, Civic Offices, 699 Doncaster Road, Doncaster - 6.30pm for 7pm Start.
(Unless Sold Prior)
Displaying a remarkable panorama of sweeping vistas from the Dandenong Ranges to the amazing skyline of the CBD this contemporary apartment possesses every attribute you could wish for including superior finishes, gleaming timber floors and a larger than expected interior. Placed on the sixth floor of the highly sought-after and architect designed Madison complex, a short stroll from popular Westfield Doncaster, this sophisticated residence offers privacy, security and exceptional lifestyle appeal. A dedicated entrance hall flows to a delightful living/meals zone taking in the beautiful views and opening to an alfresco balcony soaking up the CBD outlooks. Boasting quality Smeg appliances and Caesarstone benchtops the sleek adjoining kitchen features smart soft-close cabinetry. The charming, generous bedroom hosts a built-in-robe and luxurious twin-vanity ensuite. These spaces are complemented by a coveted study, guest powder room and separate laundry. Additional features include zoned reverse cycle heating/cooling, video intercom, security entrance and remote entry underground car space with storage cage.
Superbly located in walking distance to Westfield Doncaster retail shops, amenities and entertainment complex, public transport and ultra-convenient to schools, Macedon Square, Jackson Court, parks and reserves, Park and Ride, and entry to the Eastern freeway.
